title: 1959년 Chastain 사건
summary: 미국 Florida, FL 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Chastain. 판결일: 1959-12-14. 법원: District Court of Appeal of Florida.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: CITY OF MIAMI v. Charles David CHASTAIN and Vernon Bronson Jones
**판결일**: 1959-12-14
**법원**: District Court of Appeal of Florida
**관할**: Florida, FL

**판사**: Carroll, Chas, Horton, Pearson

## 변호인

William L. Pallot, City Atty., and James J. McVeigh, Asst. City Atty., Miami, for petitioner., Vernon Bronson Jones, in pro. per.

## 인용

- 116 So. 2d 466

## 판결문 요약


PER CURIAM.
Certiorari denied on the authority of City of Miami v. Benitez, Fla.App.1959, 116 So.2d 463, filed this date.
HORTON, C. J., and PEARSON and CARROLL, CHAS., JJ., concur.
